project_descr: Russia - Removing Barriers to Coal Mine Methane Recovery and Utilization

outputs.output_descr: The project will mitigate greenhouse gas emissions by removing barriers to the implementation and financing of coal mine methane (CMM) recovery and utilisation projects in Russia. In order to reach this goal, the project will strengthen the institutional and financial framework for the promotion of CMM projects and facilitate the implementation of selected demonstration projects so as to provide a basis for the wide scale replication of similar projects in the future.
